text: Carlos Alberto Parreira (born 27 February 1943) is a Brazilian football manager. ==Managerial statistics== Team From To Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Record Team From To Ghana 1967 1968 Fluminense 1974 1975 Kuwait 1978 1982 Brazil 1983 1983 Fluminense 1984 1984 UAE 1985 1988 Saudi Arabia 1988 1990 UAE 1990 1991 Red Bull Bragantino 1991 1991 Brazil 1991 1994 Valencia 1994 1995 Fenerbahçe 1995 1996 São Paulo 18 August 1996 26 October 1996 MetroStars 1 January 1997 31 December 1997 Saudi Arabia 22 February 1998 18 June 1998 Brazil 8 January 2003 20 July 2006 South Africa 26 January 2007 21 April 2008 Fluminense 7 March 2009 13 July 2009 South Africa 23 October 2009 23 June 2010 Total — Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rio de Janeiro Category:New York Red Bulls managers Category:Fenerbahçe football managers
